## Summary

Prof. Mei-Po Kwan will present our recent work "How Mobility Pattern Shapes the Association Between Static Greenspace and Dynamic Greenspace Exposure" at the [**RGS-IBG Annual International Conference 2025**](https://www.rgs.org/research/annual-international-conference) in London, UK. The conference will take place at the University of Birmingham and online, from Tuesday 26 August to Friday 29 August 2025.
